properties.Name: BrandProduct
properties.Description:
An association between Brand and Product. 

Brands are often associated with more than one Product and a Product can in some cases be associated with more than one Brand.

Columns.Name: BrandId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Brand.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The start date of the relationship between the Brand and Product.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The end date of the relationship between the Brand and Product.

Columns.Name: BrandProductNote
Columns.Description: A note regarding the relationship between a Brand and a specific Product.
